channel.title: MySQL on AaronJiang
channel.description: Recent content in MySQL on AaronJiang

item.title: MySQL-安装
item.author: jcx1327994105@gmail.com (AaronJiang)
item.description: Docker 1 docker run -i -p 20000:3306 -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=jcx120708 -v /appdata/docker/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql:rw -v /appdata/docker/mysql/log:/var/log/mysql:rw -v /etc/localtime:/etc/localtime:ro --name mysql_server --restart=always -d mysql
